```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r}
library(reflow)
options(reflow.quiet = FALSE)

rs <- rules(
  "expr" = rule(
    msg = "multiline expressions should be indented by one level",
    "{",
    indent(
      ws(nl = 1),
      zero_or_more(any_token(), until = "}"),
      ws(nl = 1)
    ),
    "}"
  )
)

cont <- content_tree("inst/test2.R")
match_style(rs, cont)
```
